ALL WE WANT FOR XMAS IS ...

DMC Yeltz 0 Bilston 2

22 December 1998

Here's a sobering thought: For the last three years the team in the fourth relegation spot got , and . After half our league games this season we've got 23pts.

We're now out of another cup, losing 2-0 at home to Bilston in the League Cup .
